name: Luxury Car Simulator
description:
Luxury Car Simulator is a physics engine drift auto game.

DRIVING ASSISTANCE

* ABS
* ESP
* TCS
* SH

GAME FEATURES

* Open World Environments
* Realistic Driving Experience and Feelings
* Realistic Car Damage
* Realistic Physics
* Easy Controller
* Beautiful Graphics
* Realistic Sound Environment

Test your real drift skills.
